text: 2:5 Jenesis 6:1--7:24; Jenesis 8:18; Hibru 11:7; 1 Pita 3:20; 2 Pita 3:6Ezɨ gumazamizir bar fomɨra ikeziba, me Godɨn akam barazir puvatɨ. Ezɨ a me gasɨghasɨki. An aperiam gamizɨma an otogha bar me kuavareme. Ezɨ Noa a gumazir arazir aghuibara gun mɨgeir mam, God a ko 7plan gumazamizir igharaziba bar deragha men garima me deravɨra iti.
